ncrsGatheringSites.abcd:LocalityText: CANCAP-I, Sta. 1.040: Madeira archipelago, SE of Madeira; 32°44'N 16°44'W; depth 56 m, sand and shells; van Veen grab; 10.iii.1976
Sta. MAU.060: Off Mauritania; 19°06'N 16°46'W; depth 280-350 m,rather steep continental slope, many irregular sea-urchins; 2.4 m Agassiz trawl; 12.vi.1988
CANCAP-II, Sta. 2.D07: Canary Islands, S coast of Hierro, W of Punta de los Saltos, Puerto de Naos; 27°39'N18°00'W; rocky bottom, depth 10-15 m; scuba diving 3,10.ix.1977
CANCAP-I, Sta. 1.126: Morocco, off Cape Hadid; 31°54'N 09°55'W; depth 85 m, muddy sand; 5 m beam-trawl; 25.iii.1976
AV.620617p: Yugoslavia, Hrvatska, Privlaka(= 5 km NW of Nin); 17.vi.1962
AV.610531c: France, dep. Pyrénées-Orientales, Cap Peyrefite (= 4 km SE of Banyuls-sur-Mer); 31.v.1961
GB.10: Egypt, Suez Canal, Great Bitter Lake, NW-side, Sta.10; depth 10.4 m, clay with some fine sand, no vegetation; dredging; viii/ix.1950
